mapper.select: select id, keyword, updateTime from ( select row_number() over() as r, id, keyword, updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword ) a where r = 1

select a.keyword, select a.id, a.keyword, (select max(b.value) FROM ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b where a.id = b.keyid group by b.keyid) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a where keyword = #{keyword}

select id, keyword, value, updateTime from ( select row_number() over() as r, a.* from ( select a.id, a.keyword, (select max(b.value) FROM ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b where a.id = b.keyid group by b.keyid) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a ) a ) a
where r >= #{start} and r < ( ${start} + #{end} )
select a.id, a.keyword, (select max(b.value) FROM ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b where a.id = b.keyid group by b.keyid) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a where a.id=#{id}

select id, keyword from ( select row_number() over() as r, a.id, a.keyword, (select max(b.value) FROM ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b where a.id = b.keyid group by b.keyid) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a ) a where ( r >= #{start} and r < ${start} + ${end} )
and ${whereCondition}

select * from ( select a.id, a.keyword, (select max(b.value) FROM ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b where a.id = b.keyid group by b.keyid) value, a.updateTime from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a ) a where ( r >= #{start} and r < ${start} + ${end} )
and (a.keyword=#{keyword} or b.value=#{keyword})
and (a.keyword like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or concat('%',b.value=#{keyword},'%'))
select count(*) from (select a.id from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a left join ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b on b.keyId = a.id group by a.id) a
select count(*) from (select a.id from ${siteId}_relate_keyword a left join ${siteId}_relate_keyword_value b on b.keyId = a.id group by a.id) a
mapper.insert: insert into ${siteId}_relate_keyword (keyword,updateTime) select * from (select #{entry.keyword},#{entry.updateTime} ) a where (select count(*) from ${siteId}_relate_keyword where keyword=#{entry.keyword} ) = 0
